rows.label: qst000101_msg001
rows.name: Ah, I'm in trouble[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst000101_msg002
rows.name:
Nopon are unreliable as
a fighting force, and[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst000101_msg003
rows.name:
But asking the Superbians
is out of the question[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst000101_msg004
rows.name: Hm? Ah, actually[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst000101_msg005
rows.name:
I have cargo at the port that I brought
from Invidia for trading, but[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst000101_msg006
rows.name: That thing is a bit of a nuisance.

rows.label: qst000101_msg007
rows.name: What to ask?

rows.label: qst000101_msg008
rows.name: Ask if someone is targeting it

rows.label: qst000101_msg009
rows.name: Ask if it is something illegal

rows.label: qst000101_msg010
rows.name: That's a pretty good guess.

rows.label: qst000101_msg011
rows.name: Well, the opponent isn't a person.

rows.label: qst000101_msg012
rows.name:
No.
It's not something like that.

rows.label: qst000101_msg013
rows.name:
My creed is to not
engage in shady dealings.

rows.label: qst000101_msg014
rows.name:
Actually, the contents of the cargo are
a favorite food of the Trent Krabble.

rows.label: qst000101_msg015
rows.name:
Targeting that, the Trent Krabbles
come up onto the deck
and try to steal the cargo.

rows.label: qst000101_msg016
rows.name:
The people I hired to guard the cargo
were also defeated.

rows.label: qst000101_msg017
rows.name:
So I was searching here for someone
I could ask to be a substitute, but[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst000101_msg018
rows.name:
I couldn't really find anyone,
and I was racking my
brains over what to do.

rows.label: qst000101_msg019
rows.name:
Will you take on
the role of substitute?

rows.label: qst000101_msg020
rows.name:
That is a grateful offer.
I thought you were different
from other people.

rows.label: qst000101_msg021
rows.name:
The cargo is at the Goldmund Return
Port. It's big and conspicuous so
you'll know it immediately.

rows.label: qst000101_msg022
rows.name:
Drive away the Trent Krabbles
that come to steal the cargo there.

rows.label: qst000101_msg023
rows.name: I'm counting on you.
